prompt: Create a comprehensive course modules page with a modern design featuring a top app bar with course title and settings icon, a course progress indicator showing completion percentage with a linear progress bar, and a scrollable list of module cards. Each module card should display a circular progress indicator, module number, title, description, duration, and completion status with appropriate icons. Use a clean white background with blue accent colors (#2196F3) for progress indicators and primary elements. Include proper spacing, shadows for cards, and smooth transitions.
